text: the US Navy says 10 sailors are missing
and five have been injured after one of
its ships collided with an oil tanker
off the coast of Singapore the USS John
McCain a guided missile destroyer was
damaged in the collision with the
Liberian flag vessel it's the second
serious collision involving a u.s. Navy
ship within two months let's get more on
this developing story from our Asia
correspondent krishma
vaswani what more details are coming in
